subject.description: The entity this permission pertains to. Possible options: secrets, environments

$glob.description: The secret path this permission should allow. Can be a glob pattern such as /folder-name/*/**

conditions.description: When specified, only matching conditions will be allowed to access given resource.

permissions.description:
@deprecated - use privilegePermission
The permission object for the privilege.
- Read secrets
```
{ "permissions": [{"action": "read", "subject": "secrets"]}
```
- Read and Write secrets
```
{ "permissions": [{"action": "read", "subject": "secrets"], {"action": "write", "subject": "secrets"]}
```
- Read secrets scoped to an environment and secret path
```
- { "permissions": [{"action": "read", "subject": "secrets", "conditions": { "environment": "dev", "secretPath": { "$glob": "/" } }}] }
```
